summary.p: Replaces all occurrences of a string contained in a second string with a third string.

syntax.code: REPLACE(text AS string, oldValue AS string, newValue AS string) RETURNS string

param.name: text
param.p: Is the string to be searched.

param.name: oldValue
param.p: Is the string expression to try to find.

param.name: newValue
param.p: Is the replacement string for oldValue.

returns.p: A String equivalent to text but with all instances of oldValue replaced with newValue.
